title: Drawing, "Costume Design: Hermione Gingold as Prudence in Dumas et Fils.", ca. 1967
medium: Point of brush and black wash, watercolor, opaque watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board.
signed: Signed in point of brush and black ink at lower right: Freddy / Wittop.
inscribed: Inscribed at upper right: Prudence / Hermione Gingold. Verso: Inscribed in point of brush and black ink at upper right: Dumas + Fils / Los Angeles Light opera Comp
description: Woman in Black ruffled dress trimmed with blue feathers holding fan in right hand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design: Hermione Gingold as Prudence in Dumas et Fils.", ca. 1967.
ca. 1967. Point of brush and black wash, watercolor, opaque watercolor, graphite on gray illustration board.. Gift of Freddy Wittop. 1971-1-12.
